visionCards.title: Security
visionCards.desc: Deploy and scale your applications effortlessly with our cloud platform.

visionCards.title: Efficienct Fault Reporting
visionCards.desc: Your data is protected with enterprise-grade security and compliance.

visionCards.title: Always Reliable
visionCards.desc: Connect seamlessly with a fast and reliable network across the globe.

missionCards.title: Empowering Modern Technology
missionCards.desc: We deliver secure, scalable, and intuitive solutions that help businesses operate efficiently and grow with confidence. Our mission is to make advanced technology accessible to teams of all sizes by providing tools that are simple to adopt, powerful to use, and reliable under any workload. We are committed to driving innovation that strengthens performance, enhances stability, and supports long-term digital transformation.

missionCards.title: Simplifying Digital Operations
missionCards.desc: Our mission is to create reliable, user-focused tools that remove complexity, enhance productivity, and enable teams to focus on what truly matters. We streamline everyday operations with smart automation, seamless integration, and thoughtful design that improves the entire user experience. By reducing technical barriers, we help organizations save time, reduce costs, and unlock their full operational potential.

whyGCXCards.title: Convenient Location
whyGCXCards.desc: Data centers strategically positioned for easy access and minimal latency

whyGCXCards.title: Stable Power Zone

whyGCXCards.title: Flood Free Area

vmFeatureDetailCards.title: Easily deploy and manage Virtual Machine
vmFeatureDetailCards.description: Interact with your VM how you want. Our intuitive UI, CLI, API, and Terraform Provider make it simple to manage your virtual machines.

vmFeatureDetailCards.title: Reliably Scale as Demands Shifts
vmFeatureDetailCards.description: Resize a VM or scale horizontally with many of them. Deploy across globally distributed data centers each with our 99.99% uptime SLA.

vmFeatureDetailCards.title: Build, monitor, and secure your apps for less
vmFeatureDetailCards.description: Get exceptional bandwidth pricing and 500 GiB per month of outbound data transfer—plus monitoring and firewalls for free with every VM.

vmUseCaseCards.title: Software Development & Testing
vmUseCaseCards.desc: Run multiple virtual machines to test applications across different operating systems without needing separate hardware.

vmUseCaseCards.title: Server Consolidation
vmUseCaseCards.desc: Host multiple servers on a single physical machine to save cost, reduce space, and improve efficiency.

vmUseCaseCards.title: Disaster Recovery
vmUseCaseCards.desc: Quickly back up and restore virtual machines to recover from hardware failures or unexpected outages.

vmUseCaseCards.title: Cloud Hosting & SaaS
vmUseCaseCards.desc: Provide scalable and isolated environments for clients, forming the foundation of most cloud services.

vmUseCaseCards.title: Training & Sandbox Environments
vmUseCaseCards.desc: Use isolated virtual machines for safe experimentation, learning, or testing new software.

vmUseCaseCards.title: Running Legacy Applications
vmUseCaseCards.desc: Run older operating systems or applications on modern hardware without compatibility issues.

vnfProblemCards.solDesc: Runs on any Commercial Off-The-Shelf (COTS) server, hypervisor (VMware, KVM), or major public cloud.

vnfProblemCards.proDesc: Takes weeks or months to provision and rack new physical appliances.
vnfProblemCards.solDesc: Spin up new instances instantly via orchestration (e.g., integration with NFV MANO, OpenStack, or Kubernetes).

vnfProblemCards.proDesc: Buying hardware for peak capacity, leading to wasted resources and high CapEx.
vnfProblemCards.solDesc: Scale up (vertical) or scale out (horizontal) on-demand to match real-time traffic, then scale back down to save resources.

vnfFeatureDetailCards.title: Automated Rollouts & Rollbacks
vnfFeatureDetailCards.description: Progressively rolls out changes to your application and configuration, monitoring health, and automatically rolling back if issues are detected.

vnfFeatureDetailCards.title: Service Discovery & Load Balancing
vnfFeatureDetailCards.description: Automatically assigns IP addresses to containers (Pods), gives a single DNS name for a set of Pods, and load-balances traffic across them.

vnfFeatureDetailCards.title: Self-Healing
vnfFeatureDetailCards.description: Automatically restarts containers that fail, replaces unhealthy Pods, and reschedules containers from failed nodes.

vnfFeatureDetailCards.title: Horizontal Scaling
vnfFeatureDetailCards.description: Scale your application up and down automatically based on demand (like CPU utilization) or with a simple command, adding or removing application instances (Pods).

vnfFeatureDetailCards.title: Secret & Configuration Management
vnfFeatureDetailCards.description: Securely stores and manages sensitive information (passwords, OAuth tokens, SSH keys) and application configuration without exposing them in your code or container images.

vnfFeatureDetailCards.title: Automatic Bin Packing
vnfFeatureDetailCards.description: Intelligently places containers on the available worker nodes in the cluster to optimize resource utilization while maintaining availability.

vnfUseCaseCards.title: Virtual Firewall & Security
vnfUseCaseCards.desc: Protect network traffic dynamically without physical appliances. VNFs make it easy to deploy firewalls across multiple locations or tenants.

vnfUseCaseCards.title: Virtual Router / Switch
vnfUseCaseCards.desc: Replace physical routers with virtualized ones to reduce cost and simplify network management.

vnfUseCaseCards.title: Service Chaining
vnfUseCaseCards.desc: Combine multiple VNFs (e.g., Firewall → Load Balancer → DPI) to deliver complex network services quickly.

vnfUseCaseCards.title: 5G Network Slicing
vnfUseCaseCards.desc: Enable flexible and programmable network slices for different applications (IoT, streaming, enterprise).

vnfUseCaseCards.title: Cloud & Edge Deployments
vnfUseCaseCards.desc: Deploy network functions close to users or at the edge to improve performance and reduce latency.

k8sFeatureDetailCards.title: Automated Rollouts & Rollbacks
k8sFeatureDetailCards.description: Progressively rolls out changes to your application and configuration, monitoring health, and automatically rolling back if issues are detected.

k8sFeatureDetailCards.title: Service Discovery & Load Balancing
k8sFeatureDetailCards.description: Automatically assigns IP addresses to containers (Pods), gives a single DNS name for a set of Pods, and load-balances traffic across them.

k8sFeatureDetailCards.title: Self-Healing
k8sFeatureDetailCards.description: Automatically restarts containers that fail, replaces unhealthy Pods, and reschedules containers from failed nodes.

k8sFeatureDetailCards.title: Horizontal Scaling
k8sFeatureDetailCards.description: Scale your application up and down automatically based on demand (like CPU utilization) or with a simple command, adding or removing application instances (Pods).

k8sFeatureDetailCards.title: Secret & Configuration Management
k8sFeatureDetailCards.description: Securely stores and manages sensitive information (passwords, OAuth tokens, SSH keys) and application configuration without exposing them in your code or container images.

k8sFeatureDetailCards.title: Automatic Bin Packing
k8sFeatureDetailCards.description: Intelligently places containers on the available worker nodes in the cluster to optimize resource utilization while maintaining availability.

k8sbusinessCards.title: Increased Reliability & Uptime
k8sbusinessCards.desc: Self-healing and automated failover ensure your applications are always available, minimizing costly downtime.

k8sbusinessCards.title: Scalability for Growth
k8sbusinessCards.desc: Seamlessly handle traffic surges and peak loads by automatically scaling applications and infrastructure, without manual intervention.

k8sbusinessCards.title: Faster Time-to-Market
k8sbusinessCards.desc: Automated rollouts and rollbacks streamline the CI/CD pipeline, allowing development teams to deploy new features and bug fixes rapidly and with confidence.

k8sbusinessCards.title: Cost Efficiency (Resource Optimization)
k8sbusinessCards.desc: Better utilization of computing resources through automatic bin packing and horizontal scaling means you only pay for the resources you truly need.

k8sbusinessCards.title: Portability & Avoid Vendor Lock-in
k8sbusinessCards.desc: Run your applications consistently across any environment—on-premises, hybrid, or multiple public clouds (AWS, GCP, Azure)—giving you maximum flexibility.

k8sbusinessCards.title: Enhanced Developer Productivity
k8sbusinessCards.desc: Developers can focus on writing code, not on operational concerns like where or how their application will run.

k8UseCaseCards.title: Microservices Architecture
k8UseCaseCards.desc: Perfect for breaking down monolithic applications into smaller, manageable, independently deployable services.

k8UseCaseCards.title: Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD)
k8UseCaseCards.desc: Provides a consistent environment for building, testing, and deploying pipelines.

k8UseCaseCards.title: AI/ML Workloads
k8UseCaseCards.desc: Efficiently manage the complex, resource-intensive workflows for training and deploying machine learning models at scale.

k8UseCaseCards.title: High-Traffic Web Applications
k8UseCaseCards.desc: Ensure stability and performance for e-commerce, streaming, and SaaS platforms with fluctuating, high-volume user traffic.

k8UseCaseCards.title: Hybrid and Multi-Cloud
k8UseCaseCards.desc: Deploy and manage applications consistently across different cloud providers and on-premises data centers.

appFeatureDetailCards.title: One-Click Deployment
appFeatureDetailCards.description: Push your code from Git and automatically build, deploy, and run your app in the cloud.

appFeatureDetailCards.title: Automated Scaling
appFeatureDetailCards.description: Adjust resources dynamically based on real-time traffic and performance needs.

appFeatureDetailCards.title: Integrated CI/CD Pipeline
appFeatureDetailCards.description: Streamline updates and ensure safe rollouts with version control integration.

appFeatureDetailCards.title: Built-In Monitoring & Logging
appFeatureDetailCards.description: Gain deep visibility into application performance, logs, and metrics.

appFeatureDetailCards.title: Multi-Language Support
appFeatureDetailCards.description: Supports popular runtimes such as Node.js, Python, Java, Go, and more.

appFeatureDetailCards.title: Secure by Design
appFeatureDetailCards.description: Enforces isolation, encryption, and continuous vulnerability scanning.

appFeatureDetailCards.title: Rollback Ready
appFeatureDetailCards.description: Revert to stable versions instantly in case of issues during deployment.

appUseCaseCards.title: Modern Web Applications
appUseCaseCards.desc: Deploy scalable web frontends or APIs directly from your Git repository.

appUseCaseCards.title: Microservices Architecture
appUseCaseCards.desc: Run and connect independent services seamlessly under one platform.

appUseCaseCards.title: Staging & Production Environments
appUseCaseCards.desc: Quickly spin up isolated environments for testing and release cycles.

appUseCaseCards.title: DevOps Automation
appUseCaseCards.desc: Integrate CI/CD workflows, auto-rollouts, and observability in a single ecosystem.

blockStorageCoreFunctionCards.title: Virtual Machines
blockStorageCoreFunctionCards.desc: Giving your VMs the speed and persistence of a local NVMe drive, but with the scalability and resilience of the cloud.

blockStorageCoreFunctionCards.title: Containerized Applications
blockStorageCoreFunctionCards.desc: Providing reliable, stateful persistent volumes that follow your containers, ensuring data integrity even during scaling or pod migration.

blockStorageFeatureDetailCards.title: Dedicated Performance
blockStorageFeatureDetailCards.desc: Achieve the lowest latency and highest throughput for your applications. Guarantee up to IOPS and GB/s throughput with dedicated volumes, ensuring your databases and transaction systems never suffer from noisy neighbor issues

blockStorageFeatureDetailCards.title: Elastic Scalability
blockStorageFeatureDetailCards.desc: Provision from 1 GB up to 16 TB and scale your capacity instantly and without downtime. Dynamically grow or shrink volumes to perfectly match your workload demands and budget.

blockStorageFeatureDetailCards.title: Enterprise Reliability
blockStorageFeatureDetailCards.desc: Trust your critical data to 99.999% durability. Data is automatically replicated across multiple devices, offering built-in fault tolerance and high availability to keep your applications running continuously.

blockStorageFeatureDetailCards.title: Zero-Trust Security
blockStorageFeatureDetailCards.desc: Protect your assets with mandatory AES-256 encryption for data both at rest and in transit. Control access with granular IAM policies, ensuring complete security and helping you meet compliance requirements.

snapshotFeatureDetailCards.title: Instant VM Protection
snapshotFeatureDetailCards.description: Snapshots capture your virtual machine’s entire state, including configuration and data, so you can restore it in seconds if anything goes wrong.

snapshotFeatureDetailCards.title: Effortless Management
snapshotFeatureDetailCards.description: Take snapshots with just a few clicks, assign them to projects, pick the hosting location, and give them memorable names for perfect organization.

snapshotFeatureDetailCards.title: Build, monitor, and secure your apps for less
snapshotFeatureDetailCards.description: Choose flexible hourly billing, review costs upfront, and confirm your snapshot with confidence — no surprises, just peace of mind.

backupFeatureDetailCards.title: Weekly, hands-off protection.
backupFeatureDetailCards.desc: Backups are taken automatically, typically once a week, during a configurable four-hour window to minimize performance impact.

backupFeatureDetailCards.title: Full server environment recovery.
backupFeatureDetailCards.desc: Restore your entire server image to a new instance in minutes, including the OS, data, and configuration files.

backupFeatureDetailCards.title: Rolling 4-week history.
backupFeatureDetailCards.desc: Multiple restoration points are maintained (e.g., 4 or 7 rotating weekly backups). The oldest backup is automatically replaced by the newest.

backupFeatureDetailCards.title: Secure, isolated storage.
backupFeatureDetailCards.desc: Backup images are stored on resilient infrastructure and are encrypted at rest for security and compliance.

templateFeatureDetailCards.title: Slash Time-to-Deployment
templateFeatureDetailCards.description: Move from idea to testing in minutes. Templates eliminate repetitive setups, dramatically cutting provisioning lead times and freeing your engineers for innovation.

templateFeatureDetailCards.title: Containerized Applications
templateFeatureDetailCards.description: Deploy with precision. Use the exact resources and configuration you need to reduce unnecessary compute costs and simplify budget forecasting.

templateFeatureDetailCards.title: Consistent Environments
templateFeatureDetailCards.description: Guarantee an identical starting point for every launch. Templates prevent drift, reduce hard-to-find bugs, and ensure reliable, smoother production rollouts.

isoFeatureDetailCards.title: Custom OS
isoFeatureDetailCards.description: Build VMs using any custom OS you want.

isoFeatureDetailCards.title: Simple Management
isoFeatureDetailCards.description: Assign ISOs to project and choose where they are stored for organised resource tracking.

isoUseCaseCards.title: Custom OS Installation
isoUseCaseCards.desc: Deploy specialized Linux distributions or custom-built operating systems tailored to your needs.

isoUseCaseCards.title: System Recovery
isoUseCaseCards.desc: Boot into recovery environments to diagnose issues, repair systems, or restore data.

isoUseCaseCards.title: Testing & Development
isoUseCaseCards.desc: Test new OS versions, beta releases, or development builds in isolated environments.

isoUseCaseCards.title: Specialized Appliances
isoUseCaseCards.desc: Run network appliances, security tools, or specialized software distributions.

isoHowItWorkCards.title: Upload Your ISO
isoHowItWorkCards.description: Upload ISO files via web interface

isoHowItWorkCards.title: Attach to VM
isoHowItWorkCards.description: Mount the ISO to any virtual machine

networkFeatureDetailCards.title: Public Networks
networkFeatureDetailCards.description: Logically isolated environments with internet-facing IPs and clear traffic control.

networkFeatureDetailCards.title: Virtual Networks
networkFeatureDetailCards.description: Fully isolated virtual networks for private cloud segments with custom CIDR and DNS.

networkFeatureDetailCards.title: Virtual Routers
networkFeatureDetailCards.description: Software routers connecting multiple subnets with NAT, routing and firewall services.

networkHowItWorkCards.title: Choose Network Type
networkHowItWorkCards.description: Select public or virtual network based on your needs

networkHowItWorkCards.title: Configure Settings
networkHowItWorkCards.description: Define CIDR, subnet mask, gateway and DNS

networkHowItWorkCards.title: Add Security Rules
networkHowItWorkCards.description: Set up security groups and firewall policies

networkHowItWorkCards.title: Connect & Deploy
networkHowItWorkCards.description: Attach instances and enable VPN connectivity

networkCapabilities.title: Security Groups
networkCapabilities.desc: Virtual firewalls to control inbound and outbound traffic with protocol, port ranges and CIDR specifications.

networkCapabilities.title: IP Management
networkCapabilities.desc: Dynamic IP addressing and public IP pools. Acquire new IPs, add firewall rules and set up port forwarding.

networkCapabilities.title: VPN & Hybrid Connectivity
networkCapabilities.desc: Connect remote users and on-premises environments with secure VPN access and customer gateways.

networkCapabilities.title: Scalable Architecture
networkCapabilities.desc: Build resilient networks from simple public networks to complex multi-subnet architectures.

loadBalanceFeatureDetailCards.title: High Availability
loadBalanceFeatureDetailCards.description: Spread incoming traffic across multiple servers, preventing overload and ensuring consistent uptime.

loadBalanceFeatureDetailCards.title: Flexible Billing
loadBalanceFeatureDetailCards.description: Pay hourly, monthly or quarterly—choose a cycle that matches your workload and budget.

loadBalanceFeatureDetailCards.title: Sticky Sessions
loadBalanceFeatureDetailCards.description: Keep user sessions persistent with load balancer or application cookies, or disable for true round robin.

loadBalanceWhyChooseCards.title: High Availability & Reliability
loadBalanceWhyChooseCards.desc: Incoming traffic is spread across multiple servers, preventing overload and ensuring consistent uptime for your applications.

loadBalanceWhyChooseCards.title: Flexible Billing Options
loadBalanceWhyChooseCards.desc: Pay hourly, monthly or even quarterly—choose a billing cycle that matches your workload and budget requirements.

loadBalanceWhyChooseCards.title: Built-in Sticky Sessions
loadBalanceWhyChooseCards.desc: Keep user sessions persistent with load balancer or application cookies, or disable stickiness for true round robin distribution.

loadBalanceWhyChooseCards.title: Smart Algorithms
loadBalanceWhyChooseCards.desc: Pick from Source-based routing, Round Robin or Least Connections to optimize performance for your specific use case.

loadBalanceAlgorithmCards.title: Round Robin
loadBalanceAlgorithmCards.description: Distribute requests evenly across all servers

loadBalanceAlgorithmCards.title: Least Connections
loadBalanceAlgorithmCards.description: Route to server with fewest active connections

loadBalanceAlgorithmCards.title: Source-Based
loadBalanceAlgorithmCards.description: Route based on client IP for consistency

dnsFeatureDetailCards.title: Easy Domain Creation
dnsFeatureDetailCards.description: Add a new domain in a few clicks—just choose your project and enter your domain name.

dnsFeatureDetailCards.title: All the Records You Need
dnsFeatureDetailCards.description: Support for A, AAAA, CNAME, MX, TXT, NS, SRV and SOA records for complete DNS management.

dnsFeatureDetailCards.title: Clear Examples
dnsFeatureDetailCards.description: Each record type comes with example values and TTL defaults to help you get up and running quickly.

dnsWhyChooseCards.title: Flexibility
dnsWhyChooseCards.desc: Manage multiple projects and zones with a single interface. Organize domains across different projects effortlessly.

dnsWhyChooseCards.title: Reliability
dnsWhyChooseCards.desc: Robust infrastructure ensures your DNS responds quickly and consistently, keeping your services always accessible.

dnsWhyChooseCards.title: Clarity
dnsWhyChooseCards.desc: Built-in examples and tooltips mean you don't need to be a DNS expert to make it work. Simple and intuitive.

dnsWhyChooseCards.title: Root or Subdomain
dnsWhyChooseCards.desc: Use @ to set records for the root domain or specify any subdomain you want for flexible configuration.

dnsHowItWordCards.title: Add Your Domain
dnsHowItWordCards.description: Choose your project and enter your domain name

dnsHowItWordCards.title: Configure Records
dnsHowItWordCards.description: Add A, AAAA, CNAME, MX, TXT or other record types

dnsHowItWordCards.title: Set TTL Values
dnsHowItWordCards.description: Use default TTL or customize based on your needs

dnsHowItWordCards.title: Let It Run
dnsHowItWordCards.description: Our platform handles DNS resolution automatically

affinityGroupOfferCards.title: Maximize Performance
affinityGroupOfferCards.desc: Affinity rules ensure interdependent VMs are co-located on the same host, which eliminates network latency and guarantees peak application speed.

affinityGroupOfferCards.title: Ensure Fault Tolerance
affinityGroupOfferCards.desc: Anti-Affinity rules strategically separate redundant services across different hosts, preventing any single hardware failure from causing a total service disruption.

affinityGroupOfferCards.title: Optimize Infrastructure
affinityGroupOfferCards.desc: The strategic placement controls spread heavy workloads evenly across the cloud, avoiding resource bottlenecks and ensuring optimal utilization of all physical hosts.

affinityGroupFeatureDetailCards.title: Affinity Placement
affinityGroupFeatureDetailCards.desc: Dictates the mandatory clustering of selected VMs onto the same physical host, delivering the tangible benefit of near-zero network latency essential for hyper-accelerated communication between tightly integrated application components.

affinityGroupFeatureDetailCards.title: Anti-Affinity Placement
affinityGroupFeatureDetailCards.desc: Enforces the strategic dispersal of selected VMs across distinct physical hosts, delivering the essential benefit of ironclad high availability by isolating redundant services from single points of physical failure.

affinityGroupFeatureDetailCards.title: Hard Rules
affinityGroupFeatureDetailCards.desc: The policy represents a non-negotiable deployment commitment—if the stringent placement criteria cannot be met, the provisioning request is halted—making it the ultimate lever for guaranteed placement required by critical compliance or mission-critical HA mandates.

affinityGroupFeatureDetailCards.title: Soft Rules
affinityGroupFeatureDetailCards.desc: The policy establishes an optimal placement preference that the orchestrator diligently pursues, yet allows for successful deployment if the preference is unattainable, ensuring intelligent deployment flexibility without sacrificing the integrity of the provisioning process.
